items.question: Hvor kan jeg bruke Creator Hub innhold?
items.answer: Du kan bruke Creator Hub innhold overalt så lenge du følger vår [Content License] ({{license_url}}).

items.question: Trenger jeg spesielle tillatelser for å bruke innholdet fra Creator Hub?
items.answer: Nei, alle kan bruke innholdet vi tilbyr, Vi spør kun at du legger til en liten tekst til din video/bildebeskrivelse.

items.question: Har jeg lov til å tjene penger på mine innlegg?
items.answer: Ja, du kan tjene penger på innleggene dine, men du har ikke lov til å selge innholdet vårt.

items.question: Trenger jeg en konto for å få tilgang til Creator Hub?
items.answer: No, you can download content **with and without** an account. If you frequently use our service we recommend creating one so you can bookmark fravourite or frequently used content.

items.question: Why do I need a Discord account to login?
items.answer: We use Discord as our main communication platform and because we do not want to store user credentials of our users we chose to use Discord as our main authentication method.

items.question: Are we allowed to publish our own content?
items.answer: No, Creator Hub is designed to serve high quality content to make content creation easier. To prevent spam and content that does not meet our requirements we have decided to only allow our admins to post content.

items.question: Is my data safe on your servers?
items.answer: Absolutely, we only store the bare minimum. Everything that is not needed is discarded right after we used it, this is to prevent account hijacking and attacks on our servers. Please refer to our [privacy policy]({{privacy_policy_url}}) for more information.
